title: Thai Lottery Result

api_list.name: Check Lottery Results
api_list.description: Check Lottery Results it can check up to 10 numbers in same time - ตรวจผลสลากตามงวด สามารถตรวจผลได้ครั้งละสูงสุด   10 เลข

api_list.name: Lottery Results by Date ID
api_list.description: Lottery Results by date id - ผลการออกรางวัล
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thai-lottery-result.p.rapidapi.com/results/{dateid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thai-lottery-result.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest Draw Date
api_list.description: Get latest draw date information - รายการข้อมูลวันหวยออกล่าสุด
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thai-lottery-result.p.rapidapi.com/latest"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thai-lottery-result.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
